channel.title: First attempt at an abstract signature
channel.description: I was browsing through some tutorials found a cool looking text one. Then i just starting playing around the text tutorial came in handy as it was similar to the colours I chose. Pretty easy to make dont comment on that. Comment on how it looks please. [IMG]http://img367.imageshack.us/img367/9789/sig4nrcopybg7.png[/img] Attempt 2: [IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/3108/jiccopyzn7.png[/img]

item.title: First attempt at an abstract signature
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

[quote=“brownsymcard, post:20, topic:193397”]Text is horrible, and I can recognize which brush you used :p.

Overall its good for a first attempt though.

EDIT:

Here:

DeviantArt

Winter Breeze Brushes

PLEASE READ THIS JOURNAL IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS ABOUT USING! HEY! If you think you've seen these brushes on a pepsi can (In Canada) then you probably have! PHOTOSHOP 7 VERSION: Winter Breeze Br...

Very first brush in the list from this pack :p.[/quote]
Great brushes though, you can’t deny it. And its the last two in it, there softer and more transparent.

Read full topic

item.source: First attempt at an abstract signature

item.title: First attempt at an abstract signature
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:12, topic:193397”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=257412.msg2141181#msg2141181 date=1206732976]
Text is horrid. Never hide your text in the corner, then make it stand out more than the rest of the image. The composition for the first one is nice, but it’s dull and boring to look at. Second signature just sucks.
[/quote] I thought the second one is best. Why care so much about the text? Look at the sig! I would say actually make the text smaller, if there was no such thing as leechers, your name would not be needed. And also, make a border for the second one two. GJ.[/quote]

3/4 of the tags on here suck so they dont need names. Who would leech something that sucks anyways?

Read full topic
item.source: First attempt at an abstract signature

item.title: First attempt at an abstract signature
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:10, topic:193397”]Text is horrid. Never hide your text in the corner, then make it stand out more than the rest of the image. The composition for the first one is nice, but it’s dull and boring to look at. Second signature just sucks.[/quote] I thought the second one is best. Why care so much about the text? Look at the sig! I would say actually make the text smaller, if there was no such thing as leechers, your name would not be needed. And also, make a border for the second one two. GJ.

Read full topic

item.title: First attempt at an abstract signature
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

Also, It all depends on what you like a signature to look like. I like the simplistic, not nessisarily uncomplex. But just to look smooth and spacious.
